testcase.name: REST API Testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx/CelsiusToFahrenheit" . passed And header Content-Type = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" ............. passed And request "Celsius=40" .................................................. passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains "104" ......................................... passed And match response //string == "104" ..................................... passed
